attributes.action: Provide free self defence classes for women of all ages.
attributes.additional_details:
It is apparent in todays society that women do not feel safe in their surroundings.
94% of women have been sexually harassed whether they are going/returning from work, walking home alone, walking past a crowd of people. These are everyday normal activities and for them not to feel safe doing them is a disgrace. By no means is this a solution, but if we can help women feel safer & more confident carrying out these everyday tasks then surely it is worth it.
attributes.background: Provide funding to schools, gyms and leisure centres for them to be able to put on free self defence classes for women of all ages.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578919
